title: Candlestick, 2011-9-2-a,b, 1750–65
provenance: Purchased by Jeffrey Tillou Antiques, in Farmington CT from a collector of fine brass wares, who had purchased them in England along with others, between the 1960s and 1980s.
creditline: Museum purchase from General Acquisitions Endowment Fund
description: moulded baluster stem, on quatri-lobate stepped petal bases, the scalloped drip pans on the campana-shaped girdled candleholder  above a scalloped knop; stick unscrews in two places to form three sections
